item.title: Change Logs
item.description: State Emergency Department template (state_ed_report) 6/8/2021 State Emergency Department template available. Text Analysis Interactive Dashboard template (text_mining) 10/19/2021 The Text Mining template has been updated. This version contains a custom Query field that allows users to enter their own ESSENCE query. 9/29/2021 The Text Mining template has been updated. This version: Prematurely exits the knit when bad User Credentials are entered.
